Welcome to Swastham Ayurveda

Discover the transformative power of Ayurveda, where ancient wisdom meets modern wellness under the expert guidance of Dr. Sasi Keezhattupurath, BAMS.

Book a Consultation Meet Dr. Sasi

A Legacy of Ayurvedic Excellence

About Dr. Sasi Keezhattupurath

With over 32 years of clinical expertise, Dr. Sasi is a respected Ayurvedic physician renowned for his ability to bridge the ancient principles of Ayurveda with modern approaches to health. His journey began with a rigorous seven-and-a-half-year Gurukula program, instilling a deep, authentic understanding of the practice.

Trusted by a diverse global clientele, Dr. Sasi's patient-centered, integrative approach makes Ayurveda accessible, compassionate, and highly effective.

Learn More About Our Philosophy

Why Choose Swastham Ayurveda?

Our care is rooted in four key principles.

Experienced Vaidyas

Our team consists of highly qualified and seasoned Ayurvedic physicians.

Authentic Therapies

We use traditional methods and high-quality, genuine herbal preparations.

Personalized Care

Every treatment plan is customized to your unique body constitution.

Patient Satisfaction

We are proud of our 4.9+ Google rating and positive patient testimonials.

Our Core Treatments

Foundational therapies to restore balance and health.

Panchakarma

A comprehensive detoxification program to purify the body and mind.

Learn More
Abhyanga

A traditional full-body massage with medicated oils to improve circulation.

Learn More
Shirodhara

A calming therapy where warm oil is poured over the forehead to soothe the mind.

Learn More

Ayurvedic Treatments

Explore our authentic therapies for holistic well-being.

Ilakkizhi Therapy

A rejuvenating massage using herbal poultices to relieve pain, inflammation, and stiffness.

Learn More
Karkidaka Chikitsa

A specialized monsoon regimen to detoxify the body and boost immunity during the rainy season.

Learn More
Virechana Therapy

A medicated purgation therapy that cleanses the gastrointestinal tract and eliminates toxins.

Learn More
Ayurvedic Facial

A natural, herbal facial treatment to cleanse, nourish, and rejuvenate the skin for a healthy glow.

Learn More
Ayurvedic Psychiatry

Holistic management of mental health concerns through counseling, herbs, and therapies.

Learn More
Snehapana Therapy

An internal oleation process involving the consumption of medicated ghee to prepare for detox.

Learn More

What Happens During Treatment Programs?

Our treatment modalities include:

External Therapies

Soothing therapeutic procedures applied to the body to nourish and detoxify.
Internal Medications

Pure, potent herbal formulations to correct internal imbalances.
Dietary Guidance

Personalized nutrition plans based on your unique body constitution.
Purification (Panchakarma)

The five core Ayurvedic processes for deep cellular detoxification.
Lifestyle Counseling

Guidance on daily routines, yoga, meditation, and stress management.

Meet Our Founder

Dr. Sasi Keezhattupurath, BAMS

With over 32 years of clinical expertise, Dr. Sasi’s patient-centered, integrative approach makes Ayurveda accessible, compassionate, and highly effective.

He specializes in the holistic management of chronic diseases, rejuvenation therapies, women’s health, and stress-related disorders. Patients from England, France, the USA, Mauritius, and the Middle East have all benefitted from his personalized therapies and holistic guidance.
